vocabInfos.lsjDefs:
Κούαρτος, -ου, ὁ
(Lat.), Quartus: Rom.16:23.†
(From Abbott-Smith. LSJ has no entry)
vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man living at the time of the New Testament, only mentioned at Rom.16.23
§ Quartus, "fourth [born]"
Quartus, a Latin (Proper name), Rom. 16:23*
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
括士 这个陽性專有名詞在拉丁文的意思是 "第四"
一名信徒 (羅 16:23)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
括士 这个阳性专有名词在拉丁文的意思是 "第四"
一名信徒 (罗 16:23)
